Empty constructor
BotEvent(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Quackbot.info.BotEvent
General constructor sets most information

Convience Constructor for only configuring message and extra object.
BotEvent(String, Object, Object) - Constructor for class Quackbot.info.BotEvent
Convience Constructor for only configuring message and 2 extra objects.
BotEvent(String, String, String, String, String, Object) - Constructor for class Quackbot.info.BotEvent
Big constructor, configures everthing but the second extra object
BotEvent(String, String, String, String, String, Object, Object) - Constructor for class Quackbot.info.BotEvent
Biggest Constructor, configures everything possible
botLocked - Variable in class Quackbot.Bot
Says wheather bot is globally locked or not
BotMessage - Class in Quackbot.info
Bean that holds bot message
BotMessage(BotEvent, String) - Constructor for class Quackbot.info.BotMessage
Message will be sent to user in channel who sent message will be in prefix
BotMessage(BotEvent, Throwable) - Constructor for class Quackbot.info.BotMessage

BotMessage(String, String) - Constructor for class Quackbot.info.BotMessage
